issue.title: [C++] Don't export symbols of statically linked libraries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1747](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1747). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we export the symbols of the underlying compression libraries like Brotli. These are private dependencies of Arrow and should not pollute the linking namespace.
